review.title: “Excellent”
review.pros: Pros – A self starting office with interesting and varied project work. The office allows a flexible schedule and a level of autonomy that requires disciplined work habits.
review.cons: Cons – While the office requires individual responsibility from every employee there are times when you feel isolated and unsupported in the work environment.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
